Reviews.Content: Adored the Millennium In addition to an ideal location (just beside the train station) , my room had a gorgeous fresco on the ceiling, a charming canopy bed, a giant bathroom and shower, and a terrace. I had friends also in Florence who were spending twice the money for dirty rooms in worse locations. The staff was more than helpful, and I was able to use internet on my own laptop, which is ideal for me to keep in touch with my work back home. Each morning, a sweet girl brought breakfast to the room, and the owner, who seemed to know everything about the city, directed me to the most delectable restaurants. Overall, it was a resplendent experience and I would heartily recommend it to anyone traveling to Florence.
Reviews.Author: jbeckham

Reviews.Content: Hated the owner and hotel!!! Never stay at this place!!!It started out looking nice, but as soon as we pre-paid our room the owner started acting really disgustingly. he didn't provide us with any essentials of a normal hotel room, like soap hangers in the closet, making the beds, cleaning the bathroom.There was damage to the room before we came in and he blamed us for it and made us pay to get it fixed. The owner was incredibly rude, deceiving and treated us awfully. we moved to a much nicer hotel and cheaper about two blocks away closer to the city center called the Old Florence Inn.
Reviews.Author: nkmtk

Reviews.Content: The best experience The hotel is brand new, the bathroom in our room was immaculate, flat screen tv, air condition work perfectly!All of the people at the hotel were like a family. I was deeply moved by their service. I strongly recomend anyone who is going to visit Firenze.
Reviews.Author: russellineurope

Reviews.Content: The best place in Italy! A very excellent experience. What makes the difference is the level of service provided by the staff. They have been very efficient, helpful and friendly. I totally enjoyed this wonderful experience. Looking forward to coming again.
Reviews.Author: joelfly

Reviews.Content: Hidden Gem We traveled with a group of 4 in April,2008. All of our rooms were unique,spaceous and beautiful in there own way and our bathrooms were brand new with working showers, finally! The staff was just fantastic, the owner pays a lot of attention to his guests with heplful recommendations about sightseeing and entertaining.
Reviews.Author: carlme

Reviews.Content: Owner is INSANE and potentially dangerous. Initially thought the place was nice with location and price, but those feelings changed when we had a very scary interaction with the owner. One night he got drunk and high and decided to go about opening guests doors with his master key. After waking us up with loud music, he took me to another traveler's room at 3:00am, openend it while they were sleeping, and proceeded to go on a rant about how no one is appreciative of him, like those travelers. He then proceeded to bang on other travelers' doors to demad cigarrettes, then scream at everyone that it was time to go to bed, turning off all the electricity and hot water to ensure no one was awake. For about an hour we heard him pace up and down the hallway outside our door ensuring that no one tried to leave thier rooms. We were honestly scared for our lives and thought about leaving in the middle of the night. I hope that no one ever has the same experience we did. It really tainted our trip.
Reviews.Author: schwitty

Reviews.Content: Fabulous time in Florence! I don't understand these terrible reviews!The location is great - right by the main entry point to the city if by rail / bus (stazione s. maria novella). It is a stones throw from some of the most beautiful sights of the city (Duomo etc.) and the great shops!! The room I stayed in was the one you see in the pictures and it really is THAT pretty! You may have to share a bathroom but it was very clean and there was always hot water. I have stayed in a similar place in the city previously and it was amazing the amount of things that were 'Forbidden'. My stay at R.M was very chilled out by comparison and hugely enjoyable.The personal attacks on the owner are also confusing as I found him to be incredibly helpful and charming - he recommended some great bars and restaurants that I would never have discovered otherwise and that made my trip to the city that much more special... Will definitely be visiting again!
Reviews.Author: KiranD

Reviews.Content: Loved it Ignore all these bad reviews.....After visiting in July, my friend and I had such a great time we decided to come back 2 months later! We had a lovely big room with a beautiful 4-poster bed and gorgeous painted ceilings. The cleaners did a great job as the bathroom was spotless when I had my shower each morning. And the owner is lovely, friendly and very very funny! We will definately be going back again very soon x x x
Reviews.Author: LondonLindsay

Reviews.Content: Sleazy all the way. I was referred to this hostel by another hostel that dropped my reservation and left me stranded. In desperation I booked tand paid for the room there until I could get out the next day and look around. Not only was the room dark, dank, the walls growing mold, and the carpet filthy, but it reaked of some sort of pesticide (probably for lice/fleas!). I was told there might be a better room the following day, (as not only did he charge me a full 70 Euros for the horrible room, but also said there was a 2 night minimum! so now I was out 140 E). I returned to the room after dinner (after leaving the room open to air) and our eyes were watering from the quemicals. I left immediately and searched and found another hotel for the night and called the owner to explain we couldn't sleep in there without choking on the fumes and requested a refund. Not only could I not get the refund for that night, but he also refused the second night. I returned to return the keys and there was noone there (so I don't know what staff the other reviewer is talking about, because other guests there confirmed they never saw anyone there either) so I checked the other open rooms and they were also dumps (I so wish I'd had the presence of mind to take pictures) and smelled. I was unable to reach the owner by the number he gave me to call 24 hours a day, in order to find out where the leave the keys. I had to go to a phone booth every 1/2 hour from 9 until 11:45 am as I was afraid he would charge me for a third day even though we hadn't slept there even one night if I didn't get the keys back by whatever morning checkout time he had. All in all, it is a sleazy place. We found others on the same street that were delightful and clean for a comparable price. Don't trust the webiste pictures .... they do not reflect the reality or the smell
Reviews.Author: WORMTRAVEL

Reviews.Content: loved it We had a great stay! The rooms are lovely and the people that run the hotel are very helpful.We highly recommend it to anyone!
Reviews.Author: rob69

Reviews.Content: Italien Rudeness This is unbelievable! After arrival, the cigarrette smoking owner locked us out of the hotel for hours, finally admitted to overbooking the hotel and offered a storage room for us to sleep where it looks like the Czar of Russia's family was executed. Trying to communicate with this troll of a human, I was told I was pathetic. Never stay there!! And for God sake take this place off your web-site~ he does not deserve any respect in such a lovely city.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Awful place We've been in that accomodation for only a night, but it was quite enough to spoil our stay in Florence.The staff didn't speak anything but Italian, the guy was rude and unhelpful.The room was dark, cold and dirty, same was the shared bathroom.It was very noisy, not only from the traffic, but the owner's mobile phone kept ringing all the time, he never switched his tv that echoed in the corridor..You need to leave your keys to the owner when going out, it felt like we were watched over all the time, I coudln't go to the bathroom without being looked on..Better forget about this place, the location is good, but one can find many better places in the neighbourhood..
Reviews.Author: lass=

Reviews.Content: Disgusting hotel! I advised anyone visiting Florence to give the Residenza Millenium a miss!! The place feels like a hostel. It's very dirty, cold, noisy and dreadful. The only good thing is that it is near the train station. The photos they advertised on the internet showing the rooms are very misleading. It certainly does not look like the pictures on the internet. The owners are rude and unhelpful. Do not go there!
Reviews.Author: LondonReview
